resources.string:
We are happy that you want to eat with us! 
To move forward with your reservation please choose the date you would like to order, the time and the amount of people you will be dining with!
 If there will be a place in the specific time the reservation will be created! 
If no place found, don't worry, come back and choose another time!

Here you will be able to watch your full detailed reservation list, to delete a reservation that has not occurred yet, and create new one!\nAll the reservation are stored far away so you don\'t have to worry about closing thee application.\nIf you have a reservation that will come soon, we will notify you about the reservation 3 hours before, so you don\'t need to be worry at all!
